properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 30 DEC BY
   M/V OCEANIC CHAMPION TOWING 12 9260 METER LONG
   CABLES IN AREA BETWEEN
   21-39.0S 21-54.0S AND 038-15.6W 039-44.4W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 4163/17.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 31 DEC 17.
